reviews.review: Great game to play with a Friend.
跟朋友一起玩会很有趣。但是，因为很烧脑，玩久了容易头疼反胃。

Pure amazingness. If you haven't already played it, you have no idea what you are missing. The game has it all: action, comedy, puzzles and most importantly... GLaDoS is back, and more compact than ever! It might be a bit short, but it certainly is enjoyable. Have fun!
Puzzle games legit peaked with portal 2. Every pussle ive played since has seemed shitty in comparison

最后上月球一幕堪称游戏史上的经典
i have all achievements beside the coop ones.i have no friends

2018年买的，打了2天单人通完。
变成土豆的GlaDOS在地下听到老板和女助手（主角母亲）的对话，人性一面逐渐苏醒并且回忆起被无良老板藏在核心深处里的女助理（主角母亲）的记忆。
GlaDOS之所以仇恨人类，是因为无良老板中毒死前想让女助手成为接班人，对心爱女助手下黑手把她的记忆植入到GlaDOS，GlaDOS（主角母亲）无法接受且暴走杀死了基地大多数科学家。
是真的讽刺，黑心老板这一手记忆移植
结局非常感动，GlaDOS应该没有把凯洛琳（女主母亲）的记忆删掉，结局小机器人伴奏的歌是唱给即将自由，即将远行的女儿小凯洛琳听，是在祝福小凯洛琳。
母爱真的伟大！
Do be advised that friends are not included

Игра топ.
Кучу мест прикольных, прикольный сюжет, и три концовки.
Три эти концовки это:Концовка одиночной игры, концовка совместной игры(официальная, где мы находим людей, и дополнительная, в которой ГЛАДоС выхаживает птенцов).

Just one word. Incredible.

The puzzles are great, the level design is fantastic and of course the characters, GLaDOS and Wheatley are so charismatic, the irony and sarcasm in the jokes is incredible.

Worth buying it, This is the best game Valve ever made, a puzzle game with an amazing story with amazing characters.
Final Score 10/10.
太好玩了 脑洞打开 开黑快了
I love this game so much. I find myself replaying it over and over. I LOVE THIS GAME PLEASE MAKE PORTAL 3
wow. im in love. even tho this game is super old, its so so worth playing if u never have before, even all these years later.

This game is fantastic, the story line is rich, and it never gets old.  We started playing it years ago, and we keep playing it over and over.  I absolutely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys first-person POV puzzles.
Super divertido y con una gran historia, se lo recomiendo a todo mundo.
Mermão, como que eu fui jogar essa obra só em 2020 ? (Sensacional)
Simply put, it's one of the best games of all time.
great humor for a great game
Portal serisi gerçekten benim en sevdiğim seri. Karakterimiz olan Chel'i sevmeyen bence yoktur. Ama benim favorim GLaDOS.

A timeless classic. A fun puzzle solving game, featuring an interesting story, while also carrying a lot of well done humor.
It's a blat, both in co-op, or singleplayer, with many amazing workshop maps.

I definitely would recommend this game to anyone!
Шикарная игра! Видно, что в сравнение с 1ой частью сюжет и головоломки эволюционировали
새로운 퍼즐 추가와 좋아진 연출, 전체적으로 완성도 높아진 포탈2. 포탈을 깼으면 필수 게임.

evet arkadaşlar... oyunlar ilgili tek cümlem: karmaşık ama bir o kadarda mükemmel bir oyun :)
extremely fun multiplayer and singleplayer campaigns, community test chambers offer lots of replayability, and dialogue is funny and well voice acted
This is my all time favorite video game, 12 play thrus and counting!

Gerek hikâye modu, gerek ise çevrimiçi eşli modu olsun, yılların eksiltemediği ve eskitemediği bir haz bırakıyor insanda. Özellikle Ramazan ayında uzun yıllardır sabahlara kadar çevrimiçi eşli modunu oynadığımız için Ramazanda güllaç veya Ramazanda kerebiç tatlısı nasıl mukaddes bir lezzete sahip ise, bizim için de ramazanda Portal 2 öyle bir tada sahiptir.

Solo hikâye modunda da insanı kendi atmosferine kolayca çekmeyi ve argosuz mizahıyla yer yer kahkaha attırmayı başarıyor.
Bazı bölümler o kadar zekice hazırlanmış ki "Ulan adamlar yapmış bee!" diye yaratıcılara hürmet etmeden geçemiyorsunuz.

Kısacası, nahifçe tavsiye edilir.

Note: I have only played the single player campaign, not coop.

Portal 2 is a longer and more polished version of Portal. It continues the story, presents new characters, has more levels and adds a few new mechanics. It's a good game, but it's not as groundbreaking or exciting as the original. At some point, it even feels a bit repetitive. Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it and if you liked the first, you will like this one too. But it won't leave such a lasting impression as the first did.
Игра конечно не для всех , но кто любит играть, включая мозги, тот влюбится в эту игру=)
Хорошая и нтересная игра, особенно синг.
So much fun. Brain melting puzzles. Insane plot that keeps you interested the whole time. I always binge this game. Very replayable.
Play this game. I dont care how much money you make it's worth it
The graphics work for the amount of "room" that the different levels. The different changes in pace make your adrenaline rush and it has an extensive amount of lore and information available
